channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Best Noise-Canceling Headphones: Sony, Bose, Apple, and More
item.description: Tune out (or rock out) with our favorite over-ears and earbuds.

item.title: Dating safety app Tea breached, exposing 72,000 user images
item.description: Tea, an app that allows women to post anonymous comments about men they’ve supposedly dated, announced Friday that it has suffered a data breach, with...

item.title: Astronomer winks at viral notoriety with ‘temporary spokesperson’ Gwyneth Paltrow
item.description: After spending the past week-plus in the headlines due to a seemingly inescapable social media scandal, data operations startup Astronomer is trying t...

item.title: Nemo Dagger Osmo Tent Review (2025): 2-Person Backcountry Palace
item.description: Nemo’s updated Dagger Osmo 2-person tent is a well-designed, spacious palace of a tent.

item.title: Best Breast Pumps (2025): Wearable, Portable, Easy to Clean
item.description: Got milk? From wearables to popular portables, these are the breast pumps we recommend for your nursing era.

item.title: Tesla vet says that ‘reviewing real products’ — not mockups — is the key to staying innovative
item.description: “No slides was our first rule,” McNeil told the audience earlier this month at TC All Stage in Boston. “You have to be reviewing real product.”

item.title: U.K. starts enforcing online age check rules
item.description: A U.K. law requiring that pornography websites verify the age of their users took effect Friday.

item.title: Razer Pro Click V2 Vertical Review: A Hybrid Gaming Mouse
item.description: The Pro Click V2 Vertical has a steep learning curve but effectively brings the ergonomic benefits of a vertical mouse to the gaming peripheral.

item.title: CookUnity Prepared Meal Delivery Review (2025): Chef-Centric Meals
item.description: In a world filled with mediocre ready-to-eat meals, CookUnity is the first I’ve tried that feels like real cooking. Not every meal hits, but enough do...

item.title: Allianz Life says ‘majority’ of customers’ personal data stolen in cyberattack
item.description: Exclusive: Allianz Life said the "majority" of its customers and employees had data stolen in the July cyberattack. The company said it has notified t...
